title: Australian aerials team fall just short of surprise medal as Indra Brown’s final delayed by heavy snow
desc: Danielle Scott puts up stunning run in mixed aerials final to almost claim surprise medal

title: Maud Lindsay-Gamrat’s recipe for success
desc: When Maud Lindsay-Gamrat talks about food, she does not speak merely of meals — she speaks of systems, safety, dignity and opportunity.

title: Mark Ruffalo Slams James Cameron's Paramount Support in Netflix-WBD Deal
desc: Mark Ruffalo has shared his thoughts on James Cameron's letter against Netflix buying WBD, instead support for Paramount to acquire the company.

title: aidsmap: CD8 cell fitness predicts who benefits most from antibody-based cure strategies
desc: Over the last few years a number of studies aiming to cure HIV or at least achieve long-term viral suppression off ART have produced tantalising results.

title: Minister reveals process has started to ban Hizb ut-Tahrir under new hate laws
desc: Tony Burke has also provided an update on the cohort of 34 Australians seeking to leave a Syrian refugee camp.

title: INEC to Unveil New 2027 Election Timetable Amid Legal Calls
desc: Nigeria's electoral body, INEC, will release a revised 2027 election timetable to align with the new Electoral Act 2026, following demands from parties.

title: Canadians to rise early to cheer for hockey gold against U.S.
desc: From bar stools to church pews, hockey fans across the country will be rising bright and early to watch their team play for gold Sunday morning.

title: Child psychiatrist Benjamin Wen indecently touched boys while doing 'puberty checks', court told
desc: A former child psychiatrist who changed his name after being convicted of child exploitation touched young neurodivergent boys indecently at his practice, a Perth court hears. WARNING: This story contains details that may distress some readers.

title: Wheat and microbes compete underground for vital nitrogen
desc: Soil acidity shapes the battle between wheat and microbes for nitrogen, with major implications for fertilizer efficiency.

title: Eating disorder clinic to open near Mandurah as frustration grows over residential facility
desc: As an eating disorder clinic prepares to open its doors near Mandurah south of Perth, a residential eating disorder clinic is still in the planning stages despite being on the cards for years.
